thread.title: 'I don't feel very well' Gary Barlow runs off The One Show leaving Take That as a duo mid-interview
thread.title_full: 'I don't feel very well' Gary Barlow runs off The One Show leaving Take That as a duo mid-interview

author: Hayley Minn
title: 'I don't feel very well' Gary Barlow runs off The One Show leaving Take That as a duo mid-interview
text:
(Photo: BBC) 
Take That fans were quick to assume he had an upset stomach. 
One said: "So as far as I can tell Gary Barlow did a (poo) on # TheOneShow. Am I right?!" 
Another added: "I'm CREASING Gary Barlow clearly got the s**ts during # TheOneShow tonight # TakeThat # EmergencyPoo." 
Meanwhile celebrities watching at home speculated what happened, including TV presenter Dan Walker and Big Brother 's Helen Wood. 
And even bandmate Howard Donald got involved with a VERY crude take on the whole saga. 
But Gary has now revealed what actually happened, putting it down to a "hot dressing room". 
He tweeted: "Thank you all for the messages. I'm absolutely fine. We had a very hot dressing room and I thought I was gong to faint on live TV !" 
*The One Show continues on BBC One weekdays at 7pm Like us on Facebook
